item.title: Promiseをthenでつなげて、Promiseを呼び出す方法
item.description: function putObjectToS3(key, data) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { var params = { Bucket: bucket, Key: key, Body: data } console.log('p11') s3.putObject(params, function (err, data) { if (err) { reject(err); } else { console.log('p11') resolve(data); } }); }).then((data) => new Promise(function (resolve, reject) { var params = { Bucket: bucket }; s3.getBucketLocation(params, function (err, data) { if (err) console.log(err, err.stack); // an error occurred let location = data.LocationConstraint; console.log(location, data); let link = util.
